description: Simple and unpretentious, their trusted Torrentshell 3L Jacket uses 3-layer H2No® Performance Standard technology and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals) for exceptional waterproof/breathable performance, all-day comfort and long-lasting waterproof durability.
name: Patagonia Torrentshell 3L Rain Jacket - Mens
